original_text: nor did I go up to Jerusalem to those who were apostles before me, but I went away into Arabia, and returned again to Damascus.
korean_text: 또 나보다 먼저 사도 된 자들을 만나려고 예루살렘으로 가지 아니하고 아라비아로 갔다가 다시 다메섹으로 돌아갔노라

sentences.original_text: nor did I go up to Jerusalem
to those who were apostles before me
sentences.korean_translation: 나보다 먼저 사도였던 사람들에게도 가지 않았으며

sentences.original_text: but I went away into Arabia
